Instruction: Turn on your oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (175 degrees Celsius).
Combine corn syrup, sugar, eggs, melted margarine, and vanilla in a large mixing bowl. Mix in the oatmeal, then pour the filling into the pie shell.
Bake in the oven at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 1 hour, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
